name: Tune Town
description:
Ah yes, a tale as old as time itself... one lone vagabond, running through the post-apocalyptic rooftops of Tune Town, being pursued by a giant flaming skull while boppin' music is playing in the background.

NOTE
Some systems may have mild synchronization issues with the music. Restarting the game with R can sometimes fix this.

CONTROLS
Jump - Spacebar
Boomerang - Left / A or Right / D
Rhythm Gate - Up / W or Down / S
Restart - R

CREDIT
